The Plotting ModuleÂ¶

This module contains for your convenience utility functions for easy plotting using Matplotlib.

This module contains functions to make it easy to plot objects (Histograms, Profiles) from rootplots package using the popular matplotlib library

@author: Mihai Niculescu <mihai@spacescience.ro>
